Comment: The response provides a comprehensive understanding of the significance of the Twelve Apostles in Christian belief and ministry, acknowledging their role as chosen by Jesus to continue His teachings. The response appropriately reflects on the Christian worldview regarding the Twelve Apostles while presenting a respectful perspective from an Islamic viewpoint.
